TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tjuruguai, title = Tjuruguai, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjuruguai} }

S.FORM: Tjuruguai Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtung ko Tjuruguai a niyaro', 104 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 319 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 297 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Bunun1%, Amis1%, Tayal1%, roma2%.

Tjorogoai Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtong ko Tjorogoai a niyaro', 104 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 319 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 297 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Bonon1%, Amis1%, Tayal1%, roma2%.
